# Improved Unseen Servant (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** One invisible, mindless, shapeless servant

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Giant in the Playground website

This spell functions as *[[Unseen Servant (Spell)|unseen servant]]*, save that the servant has an effective Strength score equal to your caster level (maximum Strength 10) and may make [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]], [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]], [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]], [[Profession (Skill)|Profession]], and [[Survival (Skill)|Survival]] (only to provide food and water to other characters) checks with a bonus on those checks equal to your caster level (maximum +10). It canâ€™t perform any task that requires a skill check with a DC higher than 15.

The servant's speed is 20 feet and it may fly at a speed of 10 feet with perfect maneuverability.

You may assign the servant multiple tasks to complete in sequence, rather than only one task at a time.

Furthermore, the servant may use *[[Mage Hand (Spell)|mage hand]]**,* *[[Light (Spell)|light]]**,* *[[Mending (Spell)|mending]]**,* *[[Open_Close (Spell)|open/close]]**,* and *[[Prestidigitation (Spell)|prestidigitation]]* at will.
